text: Hanna Beattie (born June 1, 1995) is an American ice hockey forward, currently playing for the Connecticut Whale in the NWHL. == Career == Across 103 games with Williams College, Beattie put up 56 points. In 2014, she was named NESCAC Rookie of the Year and first team All American defender. She was named to the 2015 New England Hockey Writers Division II-III All-Star team. In 2017, she signed her first professional contract with the Connecticut Whale. After failing to score any points in her first two seasons with the Whale, she would score 6 points in 22 games in the 2019–20 NWHL season.
